document.full_text: a gulf arab plan for yemen's president to step down would guarantee the veteran leader and his family immunity from prosecution, an opposition source said on thursday, but youth activists said that should be rejected.
document.title: gulf arabs work on plan for yemen's saleh to go
lines_and_colors: a gulf arab plan for yemen's president to step down would guarantee the veteran leader and his family immunity from prosecution, an opposition source said on thursday, but youth activists said that should be rejected.
